    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Archer
    The Archer class represents an archer character in the game.
    Ascii
    The Ascii class provides functionality for displaying ASCII art from text files.
    Audio
    The Audio class provides functionality for playing audio files within the Adventure game.
    CombatConsumable
    Represents a consumable item that can be used in combat.
    Consumable
    An abstract class representing consumable items in the game.
    Entity
    An abstract base class that represents any living entity in the game world.
    Game
    Manages the core game functionality including character creation and initialization.
    HealthPotion
    Represents a health potion that can be used to heal a hero.
    Hero
    Abstract base class representing a hero character in the game.
    Item
    Represents a generic item in the game.
    ItemHero
    Abstract base class for representing an item that can be used by heroes.
    Mage
    Represents a Mage character in the game, a specific type of Hero.
    Main
     
    MainWeapon
    Represents a main weapon item that can be used by heroes.
    MaxHpPotion
    Represents a Max HP Potion consumable item.
    MiddleEarth
    Represents the world of Middle-earth where the hero embarks on a journey.
    NPC
    Represents a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the game.
    StrengthPotion
    Represents a Strength Potion consumable item.
    Tools
    The Tools class provides utility methods for text manipulation and formatting that can be used throughout the Adventure game.
    Vendor
    The Vendor class represents a merchant that sells various items to heroes in the game.
    Warrior
    Represents a Warrior character in the game, a specific type of Hero.
